Name: 鸿源战纪 - Tales of Hongyuan
About the game: HOME SYSTEM Lonely Island is provided as your private place. You can explore it, collect different building resources to improve your environment and buildings, attract businessman and open more advanced functions. THE WORLD Our story happened in a land called Ground Hong with over 30 scenery including villages, towns, cities, islands, graves, ruins and mountains. Besides the main task, our branchy ones also support you have a wide knowledge of this world. BATTLE MODE Our TBS system allows any arms, skills, buff and backup with 5V5 mode. Your speed decides your order, and you have to give a best tactics combination. TAME THE MONSTERS Most of the monsters in the game can be tamed, and tamed monsters can be used as the guard to add attributes for the role. The guard will also have a chance to fight and unleash skills at the same time as the role is attacking. Tame the monster need to buy special props, 'Tame Token' and use it in battle to wounded monster; ATTRIBUTES We provide many rare attributes for you. Use them properly will help you a lot. Walkthrough About walkthrough of our game, please click 'View the manual' to see it at our store website page, or press 'LIBRARY' - 'GAMES' - 'Properties' - 'GENERAL', then press 'Tales of Hongyuan manual' on your steam application. ANY QUESTIONS/COMPLAINTS FOR ENGLISH PLEASE hoogyuan@gmail.com Hey guys!! FOLLOW US Twitter @Tales of Hongyuan
